name: Simple Invaders
description:
This is a simple remake of the original Space Invaders arcade game. I'm just messing around with this to learn how Game Maker Studio works. Feel free to download for free or throw me some change for my troubles. The source project for this project is full open source and can be found on the github page https://github.com/mslinklater/SimpleInvaders

Linux version incoming...

Currently V0.1 - playable but lots of stuff missing
